attributes.action: Scrap the New Years Honours List
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap The New Years (Celebrity) honours List and replace it with a New Years bravery Award.  This award would be for brave acts performed throughout the year by the general public, the armed forces, police, fire-fighters etc.They could have letters after there name. Why should such a large number of celebrities be recognised for just doing a job like everyone else?
If this is not possible then anyone who has past convictions or live abroad so as to avoid paying taxes to Her Majesties Government should not be recognised in the New Years Honours List.
